item.title: Reviewing the Moleskine Cahier
item.description: Cahier Journal The Moleskine Cahiers are journels with a flexible heavy-duty cardboard cover in [colour] with visible stitching on the spine. The last 16 sheets are detachable and there is a pocket for loose notes. Each set of 2 pieces includes the Moleskine history. [Citation: above, as read by Google Assistant] The reviews were sad. Literally sad. Ink bleeds through.
